summary: This simple replacer transforms the default Steel Battleaxe into a single-bitted one.
descriptionHtml:
I really like the look of the Iron Battleaxe so with this Steel one I was going for something similar in style. Not perfect by any means; I was willing to add a spike behind the blade but couldn't immediately figure out an utterly seamless way to implement it. This should suffice for now.
Something quick and dirty to ease myself back into the 3dsmax/nifskope juggling routine.

Should work with retextures, haven't tested any alternatives myself though.


---------------
Installation
---------------
Place the 'Meshes' folder inside the game's DATA directory.



Credit & thanks to Bethesda for Skyrim and its assets.
author: defunkt

files.name: Single-bitted Steel Battleaxe REPLACER
files.changelogHtml: Version 1.1 fixes missing "edge blood" on the blade.
